quest.name: Much at Steak
journal:
Zukin is exploring a new avenue of business with the Namazu.

â€»Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Slay a spry gyuki and collect a cut of gyuki meat.

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: In our dealings with the Namazu, we have discovered that one of their favorite foods is the meat of the fearsome gyuki.

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: However, the Namazu struggle to acquire said meat by themselves. Shrewd in business they may be, but adept hunters they are not. Might I call upon your services once more?

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: So, was the hunt a success?

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: Kami have mercy! If size and stench are the measures by which Namazu judge their meat, I would say they will be more than satisfied.

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: Man and Kojin alike tend to be repulsed by such pungent, sinewy fodder, but the Namazu have no such aversions.

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: Trade in this otherwise worthless meat will help forge stronger ties with the Namazu and provide much-needed capital. Perhaps we can rely on your gyuki-slaying skills in the future?
